remarks: Inverse of a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) Obsolete version of ~ gsumzinv as of 6-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzinvOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.p $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzinvOLD.n $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzinvOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
